description: A new study reveals that the brain relies on signal strength in the fusiform gyrus to decide whether visuals are real or imagined. This “reality threshold” may help explain how imagination can influence perception and sheds light on disorders like schizophrenia. Researchers believe this mechanism could be central to understanding hallucinations and cognitive disruptions in visual processing.
title: Brain’s Built-In Signal Threshold Helps Differentiate Imagination from Reality

description: A recent study reveals the feather-legged lace weaver spider doesn’t inject venom but instead kills by coating its prey with regurgitated toxins on silk. Despite lacking venom glands and ducts, this unique method proves equally lethal and may redefine how scientists understand spider evolution and prey capture strategies, according to findings published in BMC Biology.
title: Feather-Legged Lace Weaver Spider Uses Toxic Silk Instead of Fangs to Kill Its Prey

description: NASA and the U.S. Department of Defence carried out joint emergency rescue simulations for Artemis II, rehearsing astronaut recovery during launch abort scenarios. Conducted off Florida’s coast, the drills involved the Orion test capsule, mannequins, and military rescue teams. These exercises enhance preparedness to safely return crew members during any launch failure on NASA’s first crewed Moon mission in decades.
title: NASA and DoD Simulate Critical Abort Scenarios to Secure Artemis II Moon Mission

description: A NASA-developed model now enables scientists to estimate the likelihood of life on distant planets or moons using limited and uncertain remote-sensing data. By comparing habitat conditions with known lifeforms or hypothetical organisms, the framework offers a probabilistic tool to assess alien environments and improve telescope targeting in the ongoing search for extraterrestrial life.
title: New Habitability Model Helps Identify Which Alien Planets Might Be Able to Host Life

description: SpaceX launched 26 Starlink satellites from California on June 16, advancing its global broadband expansion. The Falcon 9 rocket successfully delivered the payload to low Earth orbit, and its booster completed a third landing on a Pacific droneship. The mission supports Starlink’s growing constellation, which now includes over 7,760 active satellites worldwide.
title: SpaceX Launches 26 Starlink Satellites from California to Expand Low Earth Orbit Internet Network

description: Google Pixel 10 series leaks continue to surface online. Most recently, an alleged case for the Pixel 10 Pro have leaked on the Web. The images of the case show that the Pixel 10 series phones will have a slightly different design compared to their predecessors. Even though they look similar, the Pixel 9 cases reportedly don't fit the Pixel 10 and Pixel 10 Pro.
title: Google Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro Alleged Case Suggests Minor Design Changes From Predecessors

description: Nothing is set to launch the Phone 3 in global markets, including India, on July 1. Just days ahead of the formal reveal, Nothing co-founder Akis Evangelidis has disclosed details about the company's software update policy for the new smartphone. The Nothing Phone 3 will come with upgrades over the Phone 2, but will most likely lose the Glyph interface.
title: Nothing Phone 3 to Offer Longer Android and Security Update Support Than Its Predecessor

description: The Oppo Reno 14 5G and Reno 14 Pro 5G may launch in India in the first week of July, according to a tipster. However, an exact launch date has yet to be known. The Indian variants are expected to retain the design and key specifications of the Chinese counterparts. The Reno 14 5G series was introduced in China in May this year.
title: Oppo Reno 14 5G, Reno 14 Pro 5G India Launch Timeline Leaked

description: Warner Bros. Games is restructuring into devisions that will focus on its four key franchises: Harry Potter, Mortal Kombat, DC Universe and Game of Thrones. The changes come after a period of turmoil where WB Games shut three of its studios and cancelled development on a triple-A title.
title: Warner Bros. Games Restructures to Focus on Harry Potter, Game of Thrones, Mortal Kombat and DC Franchises

description: Adobe released its Firefly platform as mobile app for Android and iOS on Tuesday. The new Firefly app comes with all the native AI models of Adobe, as well as third-party models from Google and OpenAI. The app offers all the AI features and tools across Adobe’s platforms including image and video generation and photo editing.
title: Adobe Firefly App for Android and iOS Announced, Offers AI-Powered Image and Video Tools

description: India’s Shubhanshu Shukla is set to launch aboard the Axiom-4 mission on June 22 after a series of delays prompted by technical issues and safety reviews. The SpaceX-led mission will send astronauts from India, Hungary, and Poland to the International Space Station, where they will carry out over 60 experiments spanning biology, Earth science, and human research.
title: Axiom-4 Mission Carrying Shubhanshu Shukla to International Space Station Postponed to June 22

description: The Boat Wave Fortune was launched in India at Rs. 3,299 in an Active Black colourway. The smartwatch supports contactless payment up to Rs. 5,000 via Boat Pay, which uses Tappy’s tokenisation technology. It supports Bluetooth calling, heart rate monitoring, and has a 1.96-inch display. The Wave Fortune is claimed to offer a battery life of up to seven days.
title: Boat Wave Fortune Smartwatch With NFC Tap & Pay Feature, Bluetooth Calling Launched in India

description: The Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH) on Wednesday announced a FASTag-based annual pass as a cost-effective and more seamless travel solution for frequent commuters. It has been introduced exclusively for non-commercial private cars, jeeps, and vans. With this pass, MoRTH aims to reduce the hassle of frequent toll deduction on highways.
title: Government Announces FASTag-Based Annual Pass for Highway Commutes Priced at Rs. 3,000: See Benefits

description: Marathon has been delayed from its September 23 release date. Developer Bungie said it took the decision after listening to feedback from playtesters. The game will get a new release date this fall.
title: Bungie Delays Marathon, Says Will Reveal New Release Date This Fall

description: The Vivo T4 Ultra, launched in India earlier this month, is now available for purchase. It is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ chipset and packs a 5,500mAh battery. It runs FuntouchOS 15 based on Android 15 and features a triple rear camera setup led by a 50-megapixel main sensor, along with a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto lens.
title: Vivo T4 Ultra Now Available for Purchase in India: See Price, Offers, Specifications

description: After a long wait of nearly three years, Xiaomi has finally launched a successor to its ageing Redmi Pad tablet. The Redmi Pad is not meant to be a productivity device, but its smaller screen makes it more suitable for media consumption and light gaming. The newly launched Redmi Pad 2 tablet comes with a few upgrades and a refreshed design.
title: Xiaomi Redmi Pad 2 First Impressions

description: Canva is now adding a new artificial intelligence (AI) video generation tool dubbed Create a Video Clip. Powered by Google’s latest video AI model, Veo 3, the new tool can generate high-resolution realistic video clips alongwith native audio. The new feature is currently available to Canva’s paid subscribers, the Canva nonprofit users, as well as the subscribers of the Canva-owned Leonardo.ai platform.
title: Canva Adds Create a Video Clip Feature Powered by Google’s Veo 3 Video Generation AI Model

description: Coinbase has asked for US SEC's approval to offer "tokenised equities" to its customers. If granted, the move would allow Coinbase to effectively offer stock trading via blockchain technology, placing it in direct competition with retail brokerages such as Robinhood and Charles Schwab.
title: Coinbase Seeking US SEC Approval to Offer Blockchain-Based Stocks

description: The delay of the long-awaited Take-Two's Grand Theft Auto 6 to next year and price hikes to videogame hardware arising from tariffs, have made consumer spending uncertain. A report from research firm Newzoo has predicted that the global videogame market's growth rate is expected to improve only marginally in 2025.
title: GTA 6 Delay Weighs on Global Videogame Market Growth, Data Shows

description: Infinix Note 50s 5G+ is now available in a new 6GB RAM and 128GB storage configuration in the country. It will be available for purchase via Flipkart starting June 23. The handset runs on a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultimate chipset and has a dual rear camera unit led by a 64-megapixel sensor.
title: Infinix Note 50s 5G+ Now Available in a New 6GB RAM and 128GB Storage Variant in India

description: Redmi K80 Ultra will sport a circular rear camera module on the top left corner of its fibreglass back panel, with a 50-megapixel dual camera unit. It will sport a 6.83-inch flat display and a metal middle frame. The handset will be backed by a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC and a 7,140mAh battery with bypass charging support. The upcoming Redmi K Pad will be powered by the same chipset as well.
title: Redmi K80 Ultra Design, Colours, and Key Features Revealed; to Get MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC

description: Xiaomi has started teasing the Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 in China and the foldable is confirmed to debut later this month. The upcoming clamshell foldable will have a camera unit co-engineered by Leica. It will ship with Xiaomi's HyperOS interface. The Mix Flip 2 is rumoured to pack a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 Confirmed to Launch Later This Month With Leica-Branded Cameras

description: Gemini 2.5 Pro and Gemini 2.5 Flash artificial intelligence (AI) models are now generally available to all users on the Gemini app and website. Google announced the release of the stable versions of these models on Tuesday, highlighting that these will replace the preview versions. Additionally, the company also introduced a new Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite, its fastest and most cost-efficient model.
title: Google’s Gemini 2.5 Pro and Flash AI Models Are Now Generally Available to All Users

description: Sam Altman said that Meta has offered his employees bonuses of $100 million (roughly Rs. 863 crore) to recruit them. The alleged attempts by Meta to hire OpenAI staffers are the latest signs of a frenzy to hire top engineers to develop AI models.
title: Sam Altman Says Meta Offered $100 Million Bonuses to Recruit OpenAI Employees

description: US' stablecoin-focussed GENIUS Act, received bipartisan support, with several Democrats joining most Republicans to back the proposed federal rules. It passed 68-30. The House of Representatives passed a stablecoin bill last year but the Senate.
title: US Senate Passes Stablecoin Bill in Milestone for Crypto Industry

description: Discovered near the Dead Sea, the Qumran scrolls contain ancient biblical texts and writings from a Jewish sect, likely the Essenes. Archaeological and AI research shows the scrolls' origins stretch back over 2,000 years, offering rare insight into Second Temple Judaism. Their preservation in the caves continues to fuel historical and religious scholarship.
title: Ancient Scrolls Found in Qumran Caves Unlock Secrets of Jewish History and Biblical Texts

description: Buried in China’s Tarim Basin desert, the Bronze Age Xiaohe culture left behind boat-shaped coffins, cattle artefacts, and mysterious upright poles. Archaeologist Dr. Gino Caspari’s new analysis suggests these symbols represent a mirrored afterlife and a water-centric worldview.
title: Ancient Xiaohe Burials Uncovered: Boat Coffins, Cattle Symbols, and More

description: Apple is bringing its Journal app to the iPad and Mac computer with the iPadOS 26 and macOS Tahoe 26 updates, respectively. The app was introduced in 2023 on iPhone with the iOS 17.2 update. It helps users to write down their thoughts, provide suggestions on what to write about, and maintain a daily log, powered by on-device machine learning.
title: Apple Bringing Journal App to iPad and Mac With iPadOS 26 and macOS 26 Tahoe

description: Astrophotographer Greg Meyer captured a vivid 34-hour exposure of the Lagoon and Trifid nebulas glowing in the constellation Sagittarius. Framed beneath a dense starfield, the image reveals young stars sculpting gas and dust across 4,000 light-years. Taken from Arizona’s dark skies, the portrait offers a dazzling glimpse into stellar birth regions within our Milky Way galaxy.
title: Astrophotographer Captures Stunning Portrait of Lagoon and Trifid Nebulas in Glowing Detail

description: iQOO Z10 Lite 5G has been launched in India. The phone is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC and houses 6,000mAh battery. The new iQOO smartphone has a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit and a 5-megapixel selfie shooter. The Z10 Lite 5G sports a 6.74-inch display with a 90Hz refresh rate.
title: iQOO Z10 Lite 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Microsoft said it had established a strategic, multi-year agreement with AMD to co-develop chips for its future devices, including including the next-generation Xbox consoles. The next Xbox will be backwards compatible, the company confirmed. Microsoft said the Xbox experience won't be tied to one device or one store, suggesting the next-generation Xbox consoles could support storefronts like Steam.
title: Microsoft Says Next-Gen Xbox Will Run on AMD Chip, Not Be 'Locked to a Single Store'

description: Using the NSF’s Daniel K. Inouye Solar Telescope, scientists have captured the most detailed views of the Sun’s surface ever recorded. The new observations reveal ultra-narrow magnetic striations only 20 kilometers wide, etched into solar granules. These light and dark bands reflect subtle variations in magnetic field strength. Researchers say the patterns serve as "fingerprints" of fine-scale magnetism, vital for understanding solar eruptions and forecasting space weather. With its 4-meter aperture, DKIST is the world's most powerful solar telescope, unlocking new layers of the Sun’s magnetic complexity.
title: NSF’s DKIST Captures Sharpest-Ever Images of Fine Solar Magnetic Striations

description: Redmi Pad 2 was launched in India with an 11-inch 2.5K display, a MediaTek Helio G100-Ultra SoC, and a 9,000mAh battery. The tablet is claimed to be the first to support Google's Circle to Search feature out-of-the-box. It carries a quad speaker system with Dolby Atmos support, an 8-megapixel rear camera and a 5-megapixel selfie shooter. The Redmi Pad 2 comes in both Wi-Fi-only and Wi-Fi + 4G variants.
title: Redmi Pad 2 With 11-Inch 2.5K Display, 9,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: New research links nearby supernovas to drastic shifts in Earth’s ancient climate. These cosmic explosions may have eroded the ozone layer, triggered global cooling, and even caused mass extinctions. Tree ring data supports the theory, raising concerns that future stellar events, like the expected Betelgeuse explosion, could again pose serious atmospheric threats to our planet.
title: Supernovas May Have Triggered Deadly Ancient Climate Shifts, and They Could Happen Again

description: ChatGPT on WhatsApp, the chat extension of the AI platform, can now generate images based on user requests. The new feature comes four months after the company added image and voice input support to the feature. Notably, in December 2024, OpenAI released a toll-free vanity number that users could save in their smartphone, and access the chatbot in WhatsApp.
title: ChatGPT on WhatsApp Gets Upgraded With Image Generation Capability

description: Pixel 9 series were the company's first to feature ultrasonic sensors instead of the slower optical sensors found in the Pixel 8 lineup and previous generations. A new leak now suggests that the upcoming Pixel 10 series will feature an improved ultrasonic fingerprint scanner. Meanwhile, face unlock is said to remain the same, maintaining Class 3 security standards.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series to Reportedly Get a Faster Ultrasonic Fingerprint Sensor

description: The Nothing Heaphone 1 will launch on July 1 alongside the Nothing Phone 3. According to a new report, the headphones will be priced at GBP 299 (roughly Rs. 34,700) and EUR 299 (roughly Rs. 29,700) in the UK and select European countries, respectively. Meanwhile, in the US, they could cost $309 (roughly Rs. 26,700). The upcoming Nothing Headphone 1 will likely be available in black, grey, and white colour variants.
title: Nothing Headphone 1 Price and Colour Options Leaked Ahead of Launch

description: Apple has announced its Back to School offer on its online Education Store in India. The sale commenced June 17 and will run till September 30. It enables students enrolled in higher education, along with their educators, to enjoy special discounts on a variety of eligible Apple products such as iPad, MacBook, AirPods, and more. In addition to price cuts, buyers can also get free AirPods and Apple Pencil with purchases of certain products.
title: Apple Back to School Offer in India Brings Discounts on iPad Air, MacBook Pro, and iMac

description: The “flagship killer” smartphones combine flagship-grade hardware with an equally fluid software experience. These devices offer near-premium level performance without commanding an exorbitant price tag. So, if you’re contemplating a purchase of a premium handset, here’s our list of the top smartphones under Rs. 50,000 in India.
title: Top Smartphones Under Rs 50,000 in India (June 2025): Samsung Galaxy S24, OnePlus 13R, Motorola Razr 60

description: Vivo X200 FE will be launched in the global markets on June 23, the company has announced. The upcoming handset will be introduced in black, blue, pink, and yellow shades. It is teased to get a pill-shaped vertically-placed rear camera unit and a hole-punch cutout for the front camera.
title: Vivo X200 FE Launch Date, Colour Options, and Design Revealed Ahead of Global Debut
